com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.request.factory

Class UserRequestFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.request.factory.AbstractRequestFactory
      • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.request.factory.UserRequestFactory

  • @Immutable
@LevelUpApi(contract=DRAFT)
public final class UserRequestFactory
extends AbstractRequestFactory

    Class to build requests to interact with the endpoints that deal with Users.

    If you're looking to login, see AccessTokenRequestFactory.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  UserRequestFactory.UserInfoRequestBuilder
      Builder to create a request that updates the User's information.

      • buildForgotPasswordRequest

        @NonNull
@LevelUpApi(contract=INTERNAL)
public AbstractRequest buildForgotPasswordRequest(@NonNull
                                                                            java.lang.String email)
        Get a request that will allow the user to reset their password.
        Parameters:
        email - the email address they signed up with.
        Returns:
        AbstractRequest to use to reset the password for the user.

      • buildFacebookConnectRequest

        @NonNull
@LevelUpApi(contract=DRAFT)
@AccessTokenRequired
public AbstractRequest buildFacebookConnectRequest(@NonNull
                                                                                              java.lang.String facebookAccessToken)
        Builds a request to connect a user to Facebook.
        Parameters:
        facebookAccessToken - the Facebook access token to use to connect the user.
        Returns:
        AbstractRequest to use to connect the user to Facebook.

      • buildFacebookDisconnectRequest

        @NonNull
@LevelUpApi(contract=DRAFT)
@AccessTokenRequired
public AbstractRequest buildFacebookDisconnectRequest()
        Builds a request to disconnect a user from Facebook.
        Returns:
        AbstractRequest to use to disconnect the user from Facebook.

      • buildRegisterRequest

        @NonNull
public AbstractRequest buildRegisterRequest(@NonNull
                                           java.lang.String firstName,
                                           @NonNull
                                           java.lang.String lastName,
                                           @NonNull
                                           java.lang.String email,
                                           @NonNull
                                           java.lang.String password,
                                           @Nullable
                                           Location location)
        Build a request to create a new user. Will also get the device UUID and append it to the request.
        Parameters:
        firstName - user's first name.
        lastName - user's last name.
        email - user's email address.
        password - user's new password.
        location - Android Location for the user (or null if none was found).
        Returns:
        AbstractRequest representing the register request.

      • buildFacebookRegisterRequest

        @NonNull
public AbstractRequest buildFacebookRegisterRequest(@NonNull
                                                   java.lang.String facebookAccessToken)
        Build a request to register a new User via a facebook access token.
        Parameters:
        facebookAccessToken - the facebook access token to use to register the new user.
        Returns:
        the AbstractRequest to use to register the new user.

      • addDeviceIdToRequest

        public static void addDeviceIdToRequest(@NonNull
                        Context context,
                        @NonNull
                        JSONObject object)
                                 throws JSONException
        Helper method to add the Device ID to the request body.
        Parameters:
        context - the Application context.
        object - the JSONObject to add the device ID to.
        Throws:
        JSONException - if adding to the JSONObject fails.
